trans-unit.source: Contains the data sent to a tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"></xref> is matched.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it sends a UserTrackingRecord to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that tracking service.
The tracking service can perform whatever action is required on the data in the tracking record.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref> class
This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref> class by using the specified parameters.
The <xref:System.Type> of the activity associated with the user event.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the activity associated with the user event.
A number that identifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the activity associated with the user event.
A number that identifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the parent activity of the activity associated with the user event.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates the date and time of the user event associated with the tracking record.
The relative order in which the user event associated with this tracking record occurred in the workflow instance.
A key associated with the user data for this tracking record, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
The user data associated with the user event.
Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity that emitted the user data for which this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref> was created.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
The <xref:System.Type> of the activity that emitted the user data.
Gets the collection of annotations associated with the user event.
You can specify annotations to be associated with a user event in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>, it returns these annotations in Annotations.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> that contains the annotations that are associated with the user event by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"></xref> that was matched in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
Gets a list containing any additional data extracted from the workflow for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"></xref> that was matched.
When a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure can extract data from the workflow instance.
The data to be extracted is specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects, which specify member data to be extracted from the activity associated with the user event, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects, which specify member data to be extracted from the root activity of the workflow.
Each type of extract can also specify annotations to be returned with the extracted data.
The runtime tracking infrastructure encapsulates each piece of extracted data and its associated annotations in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> which it adds to Body.
Because the user data pushed to the tracking service by the user event is contained in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A>, Body will frequently be an empty list.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem"></xref> objects each of which contains a single piece of extracted data and its associated annotations.
Context of the activity.
A number that identifies the context of the activity.
Always a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) for a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref>.
There is no event data associated with a user event, therefore, EventArgs has no meaning and is always a null reference (`Nothing`).

The user data that is pushed to the runtime tracking infrastructure by whichever one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A> methods that caused the user event is sent in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A>.

Any data extracts that are associated with the user event by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> are encapsulated in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> objects and sent in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A>.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>) for a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref>.
Gets or sets the date and time that the user event occurred.
The <xref:System.DateTime> is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A <xref:System.DateTime> value.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the order of the user event that matched the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"></xref> in the workflow instance.
EventOrder indicates the order of the user event that matched the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> relative to the other tracking events emitted by the workflow instance.
EventOrder will be unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A value that indicates the order of the user event in the workflow instance.
Context of the parent activity.
A number that identifies the context of the parent activity.
Gets or sets the qualified name of the activity associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref>.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> from which the user data for this user event was emitted.
Gets and sets the user data for this user event.

UserData contains the actual data pushed to the runtime tracking infrastructure by whichever one of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A> methods is responsible for the user event.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
The user data for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref> was created.
Gets or sets a key associated with the user data for this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref>.

An activity or workflow designer can use either <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> to specify a key to associate with the user data pushed to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
UserDataKey contains this key.
If no key is specified, UserDataKey is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> key associated with the user data for this tracking record.
